item.description:
I have been travelling quite a bit recently (for family and work reasons) and have not had much time to schedule meetups. Since many of you liked Annie's idea, I am scheduling a Meetup at the location she suggested. Annie cannot do Sundays which is when I could do it myself, so in light of the fact that this is her suggestion and she requested a day that she could attend, I am scheduling it for Saturday, Feb 27th. However, I regret I will be unable to attend as I have to work. I hope you have a great time and that you post reviews and photos afterwards.

Cafe on the Common

http://www.commonroot...


677 Main St
Waltham, MA 02452
(781) 647-2456
item.name: Tea at Common Room Cafe in Waltham
